pageProduct.name: Thompson's All In One Joint Pain Relief 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's All-in-One Joint Pain Relief 60 tabs Triple action: Helps relieve joint inflammation, pain and helps protect against the deterioration of cartilage

Thompson's All-In-One Joint Pain Relief combines Glucosamine with herbs and nutrients including Turmeric and Boswellia to provide support in 3 ways:
1. Helps to relieve mild joint inflammation and swelling with mild arthritis.
2. Helps relieve mild joint pain, aches and symptoms of mild arthritis.
3. Helps maintain healthy joint cartilage growth.

Size: 60tabs

KEY FEATURES

• Helps to temporarily relieve joint inflammation and swelling associated with mild arthritis.
• Helps relieve pain, aches and symptoms associated with mild arthritis.
• Helps protect against deterioration of cartilage and reduces cartilage loss and damage.


Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Contains Glucosamine Sulfate, Portassium, soya beans, Phenylalanine, seafood.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains:
Glucosamine sulfate potassium chloride 666.7mg
equiv. Glucosamine sulfate 500mg
Nicotinamide (Vitamin B3) 200mg
Sodium ascorbate 113.1mg
equiv. Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 100mg
Lecithin 100mg
Magnesium (as orate) 6.65mg
Manganese (as sulfate monohydrate) 5mg
Colecalciferol 2.5mcg
equiv. Vitamin D3 1.0mg (100IU)
Herbal extract equiv. to dry:
Boswellia serrata (Boswella) gum 400mg
Silybum marianum (St Mary's Thistle) fruit 350mg
Vitis vinifera (Grape) Seed 120mg
Curcuma longa (Turmeric) rhizome 100mg and powdered
Murraya paniculata (Orange Jasmine) leaf 100mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
